meaningInfo: Imagine telling a piece of grain your deepest, darkest secret.
readingMnemonic: If someone finds out your <kanji>secret</kanji> (not from the grain though, it will certainly keep it) then your entire face will fill with <reading>hea</reading>t (<ja>ひ</ja>).
readingInfo: This works both ways too. If someone tells you a secret, that same heat fills you up. Now whether this heat is from embarrassment or the rush of getting to be part of a secret is up to you to figure out.
